title: AD decreases - LR change in RGDP and PL

content.question: In the long run, if aggregate demand decreases, real gross domestic product (GDP) and the price level will change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Real GDP Price Level Decrease Decrease
Real GDP Price Level Decrease Increase
Real GDP Price Level No change Decrease
Real GDP Price Level Increase Decrease
Real GDP Price Level No change Increase

content.answer: Real GDP Price Level No change Decrease

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
